head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths O'NEILL, BERNARD J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths O'NEILL, BERNARD J.

block.p: O'NEILL-Bernard J. Of New York City and East Hampton. Retired Vice President of Chemical BankChase and Executive Vice President of Chem-Lease World Wide. Beloved husband of Mary M. (White). Devoted brother of Adelaide Keller. Uncle of Joan Mahr, Edward Albat, Kevin, Michael, John and Christopher White. Reposing at Frank E. Campbell, Madison Ave. at 81 St., Monday, June 26 from 2-5 and 7-9 PM. Mass of Christian Burial, Tuesday, June 27, 12 PM, Most Holy Trinity Church, 57 Buell Lane, East Hampton. Interment Most Holy Trinity Cemetery, East Hampton. In lieu of flowers, donations to Cardinal Hayes High School Scholarship Fund, Bronx, New York or Cabrini Hospice, 227 East 19 St., NY, NY 10003, would be appreciated.

In lieu of flowers, donations to Cardinal Hayes High School Scholarship Fund, Bronx, New York or Cabrini Hospice, 227 East 19 St., NY, NY 10003, would be appreciated.
